title: S&P 500 Snaps Four-Day Winning Streak to Kick Off Fed Week
description: A rally in US stocks hit a wall on Monday as traders looked past a widely expected interest-rate cut later this week and assessed the latest corporate news.
content: A rally in US stocks hit a wall on Monday as traders looked past a widely expected interest-rate cut later this week and assessed the latest corporate news.
